description: Old-School Developers Portfolio - Static portfolio website hosted on Apache 2.4.50

endpoints: /styles.css (200 OK - Bootstrap CSS with custom styles)
/.htaccess (403 Forbidden - File exists but access denied)

notes: SECURITY ISSUE: HTTP TRACE method is enabled (reported in Allow header). .htaccess file exists but cannot be accessed directly. Contact form is handled client-side only (no backend API). Navigation uses anchor links for sections. Two project references: 'NAS (Not A Software)' and 'Modernizer 200'. Profile images for developers John and Peter.
